title: Două Mașini Ale șefului Russia Today, Post De Propagandă Al Kremlinului, Incendiate La Vila Lui De 16 Milioane De Euro Din Crimeea
cleaned_sentences: The attack in Kiseliov's domain, the director of the Russia Today (RT), set up because the Moscow authorities wanted a mass medium, took place on Saturday, September 17, at 3.00.
The Russian press notes that the police analyze the images on the surveillance cameras and hear witnesses.
Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia for Crimea has opened a criminal case for deliberate destruction or deterioration by the property by arson.
The journalist, who is also the host of the Program Vesti Nedelu, in which the propaganda for the Kremlin is made, was not in Crimea.
He did not comment on the situation.
Kiseliov bought a luxurious villa in Koktebel in 2005.
After the annexation of the Crimea region, from 2015, the RT chief was seen even more often in the area, especially as he bought a vineyard, Kimeria, and opened a winery, Cock T`est Belle.
Bought all the circulation of the newspaper that investigated his business The house on the Black Sea bank is worth 200,000,000 rubles, around 16,000,000 euros.
The way he acquired this field was investigated by the Mămto 24 newspaper.
According to the journalist who did the investigation, Kiseliov bought the entire circulation, and the material disappeared from the publication's website.
Instead, an advertising banner was placed for the vineyard of Director Russia Today.

Jumbo • 18.09.2022, 13:44 The Russians are too gentle.
